text: [Music]
i am the senior director of marketing at
Hayne Celestial hannes Celestial is the
leading natural and organic food company
here in the United States and what we do
is we bring to consumers a wide array of
foods that are better for you foods that
are are grounded in um in both natural
and organic how do we feed the world
right how do we tackle the 1 to two
billion people who right now are food
insecure on a global basis um that's a
huge issue and it's one that I think
there are solutions emerging um but we
haven't figured it out yet right and and
as the population grows we're going to
need to do a better job figuring that
out food waste is another one of those
big issues you know we we have enough
food out there to feed all the people in
the world today but a lot of it doesn't
make its way to the people who need it
and and there's a huge amount of waste
in the system you know I've seen various
numbers but it can be anywhere you know
as high as 30 to 40% of food ends up
getting wasted somewhere in the supply
chain for a number of reasons um we're
talking about some smart solutions today
on how do we tackle that issue and then
last but certainly not least is how do
we do that all in an environmentally
sustainable way right what are the ways
in which we can improve our yields um
improve our distribution methods in
terms of getting foods to the folks who
need them without ruining the
environment wrecking the environment
along the way um so so those to me are
some of the fundamental large issues
that we're grappling with
[Music]
